Package mindustry.type

Class Sector

java.lang.Object
mindustry.type.Sector
public class Sector
extends java.lang.Object
A small section of a planet.

      public boolean unlocked()
      Returns:
      whether this sector can be landed on at all. Only sectors adjacent to non-wave sectors can be landed on. TODO also preset sectors

    • getStoredTimeSpent

      public float getStoredTimeSpent()
      Returns:
      the stored amount of time spent in this sector this turn in ticks. Do not use unless you know what you're doing.

    • setSecondsPassed

      public void setSecondsPassed​(long number)

    • getSecondsPassed

      public long getSecondsPassed()
      Returns:
      how much time has passed in this sector without the player resuming here. Used for resource production calculations.
